imdb.plot outline: Cooking For Bachelors - helps a single guy survive in this uncertain dating world. With a little guidance our chefs will make you a rock star in the Kitchen. So sit back, grab your note pad and prepare to stand out above the common "take her to a restaurant guy"
imdb.title: Cooking for Bachelors
plot: Cooking For Bachelors - helps a single guy survive in this uncertain dating world from the kitchen.::Stven Samblis

Cooking For Bachelors - helps a single guy survive in this uncertain dating world. With a little guidance our chefs will make you a rock star in the Kitchen. So sit back, grab your note pad and prepare to stand out above the common "take her to a restaurant guy"::Steven Samblis
